Text: Translation Nikkei Kinyu Enron Mention Cc Please find attached translation of the article Shares of USbased Enron Corp plunge from Nikkei Kinyu Shimbun dated October Best regards IRJ PR Services

Translation Economist November Enron Mention Cc Please find attached translation of the article Enron is a phantom black ship now as its parent will be taken over from the November issue of Economist a Japanese magazine Best regards IRJ PR Services

Translation Nihon Keizai Yomiuri Enron Mention Cc Please find attached translation of the articles Enron considers withdrawal from the Japanese market from Nihon Keizai Shimbun and The Japanese unit of US energy giant Enron decides to scale down its operations from Yomiuri Shimbun both dated November Best regards IRJ PR Services

Translation Nihon Keizai Asahi Enron Mention Cc Please find attached translation of the articles Enrons credit rating is downgraded and its share prices fall clouding Dynegys plan to acquire the company from Nihon Keizai Shimbun and Enron Corp of the United States considers withdrawal from the Japanese market from Asahi Shimbun both dated November Best regards IRJ PR Services
